comment.body:
> Hello,  你好， @zoumutou
> 
> This issue is caused by Fanboy's Annoyances filter, please turn it off or add to user rules:此问题是由Fanboy的烦恼过滤器引起的，请关闭或添加到用户规则中： `@@||api.aliyundrive.com/*/share_link/`

可以了，感谢！

issue.title: "AdGuard - Annoyances >>> AdGuard - Other Annoyances", has errors with DeviantArt.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.52.0 on Chrome 117.0.5938.89 (64 bits)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.deviantart.com/somebody2978/art/Cammy-and-Chun-Li-in-England-1994-FullHD-867428983

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. "AdGuard - Annoyances -> AdGuard - Other Annoyances", has errors with DeviantArt. When you enter any image publication, you scroll down, the page creates that error and deletes the suggestions of other publications.

2. Screenshots
https://images2.imgbox.com/ff/56/rxpmZv5F_o.jpg

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This is happening to me too.

This appears to be caused by https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/7e282b7261f4c889075d29bbce8913a46fe1a1f7 which was introduced as part of https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/157292.  I'm not able to figure out enough about how filter rules work to know why, but when digging into the logger I see the rule that was introduced by that PR.

I've been able to replicate the issue rather reliably.  I don't need to be logged in to replicate it.  I just need to scroll down after a page with artwork on it finishes loading and the sidebar is replaced with the error message and the ns binding error shows up.  This is on firefox 117.0.1 so it seems to not be dependent on the browser used (since OP was using chrome).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.52.0 on Chrome 117.0.5938.89 (64 bits)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.deviantart.com/somebody2978/art/Cammy-and-Chun-Li-in-England-1994-FullHD-867428983

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. "AdGuard - Annoyances -> AdGuard - Other Annoyances", has errors with DeviantArt. When you enter any image publication, you scroll down, the page creates that error and deletes the suggestions of other publications.

2. Screenshots
https://images2.imgbox.com/ff/56/rxpmZv5F_o.jpg

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Fixed, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

comment.body:
Реклама не повторяется, но убрал остаток. 
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры через 2-3 часа (подождите около одной минуты их применения в программе), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

comment.body:
@agranapz Ok.
Please follow these steps:
1. Close the app
2. Go to AdGuard => `Activity` and clear it (3 vertical dots icon)
3. Go to Protection => DNS protection and select DNS server - non filtered (AdGuard non-filtered, Google or Cloudflare)
4. Go to DNS requests filtering and enable AdGuard DNS filter.
5. Open the app and reproduce an issue 2-3 times
6. Go to AdGuard => Activity, swipe down to refresh and make screenshots of blocked requests. You can enable display only blocked requests using the Filter icon.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/161778#issuecomment-1728476423 not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

Не повторяется с фильтром раздражителей, но лучше установите AdGuard Extra.

---

Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Latest nightly

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Most; examples below

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Experimental filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots

As a followup to https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/111351 & https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/48254, the sibling sites have the potential for a simple URL rewrite to reduce ads & then regular filtering improves.  Examples are 
- [ ] [https://notthebee.com/<kbd>**article**</kbd>/check-out-this-mini-oasis-that-this-dude-made-on-his-balcony-for-all-the-neighborhood-squirrels](https://notthebee.com/article/check-out-this-mini-oasis-that-this-dude-made-on-his-balcony-for-all-the-neighborhood-squirrels) → [https://notthebee.com/<kbd>**cleanArticle**</kbd>/check-out-this-mini-oasis-that-this-dude-made-on-his-balcony-for-all-the-neighborhood-squirrels](https://notthebee.com/cleanArticle/check-out-this-mini-oasis-that-this-dude-made-on-his-balcony-for-all-the-neighborhood-squirrels)

- [ ] [https://babylonbee.com/<kbd>**news**</kbd>/report-the-squirrels-are-up-to-something](https://babylonbee.com/news/report-the-squirrels-are-up-to-something) → [https://babylonbee.com/<kbd>**cleanArticle**</kbd>/report-the-squirrels-are-up-to-something](https://babylonbee.com/cleanArticle/report-the-squirrels-are-up-to-something)

### Privacy

Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters without third-party ones (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
